title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Blended Mathematics Learning Program Based on MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve at least two applied mathematics case problems per week using MOOC content in a mobile learning environment
Learners can complete one peer-feedback-based mathematics project through study circle activities
Learners can apply statistical techniques acquired from MOOCs to enterprise field data analysis scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
